name: 2 days 1 night for discovering Co tu ethnic culture and experience The Ho Chi Minh Trial
description:
What do you expect from a trip? Meeting new people, discovering new culture, experience new challenge or just wanting to find a peaceful land to think about your life?
With this 2 days 1 night trip, you can do all of them. 
You can meet people from Da Nang and Co tu people; discover Co tu ethnic people culture; experience The Ho Chi Minh Trial in more than 300km; Co tu people village is the most peaceful place I have ever been.
Now, let's go and tell me something that you felt.
